steps.title: Configure Alien 4 Cloud
steps.content: Click here to setup users, clouds as well as monitor Alien 4 Cloud.

steps.title: User configuration
steps.content: Click here to setup users, groups and their roles.

steps.title: Plugin configuration
steps.content: Click here to add/remove and setup plugins. Plugins are mandatory to setup clouds as you need at least one PaaS provider plugin.
